#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define fo(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define Fo(i,k,n) for(i=k;i<n;i++)
#define lli long long int
using namespace std;
void sd(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
void sd(lli &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int main()
{
	lli k;
	int i;
	int n;
	sd(n);
	sd(k);
	lli arr[n];
	fo(i,n)
		sd(arr[i]);
		
	sort(arr,arr+n);
	int s,e;
	s=0;
	e=n-1;
	int flag=0;
	while(s<e)
	{
		if(arr[s]+arr[e]==k)
		{
			flag = 1;
			break;
		}
		else if (arr[s]+arr[e] < k) s++;
		else e--;
	
	}
	if(!flag)
		printf("No\n");
	else
		printf("Yes\n");
	
	return 0;
}
